The Laboratory for Autonomous Systems in Exploration and Robotics (LASER) researches autonomy for robots in extreme and unstructured environments.

We are currently recruiting!

Robust model improvement for on-orbit robots (RATTLE)
Persistent leader election for multi-robot exploration (Lunar Leader)
Change detection in microgravity (AstrobeeCD)
